testcase.name: And I enter abc123 into password text fields on home screen
Then I verify that i am an invalid login page
Given I am on home page
When I enter smith@technosoftacademy.io into username text fields on home screen
And I enter test into password text fields on home screen
Then I verify that i am an invalid login page
